Functions
fza_fnc_lightSetCockpitLight
Description

Sets the cockpit light to the correct state

Parameters
_heli

The heli to act upon

_state

whether the cockpit light should be off. 0 or false for off, 1 or true for on.

Returns

Nothing

Examples
[_heli, false] call fza_fnc_lightSetCockpitLight;
//Cockpit light is now off
Author

Rosd6(Dryden)
